title: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita! Special
synopsis: Hinata Hoshino, Hana Shirosaki, and Noa Himesaka are off to the countryside for a camping trip. At Hinata's behest, her elder sister, Miyako, reluctantly tags along. Seeing how gloomy Miyako is, the trio do their best to get her to enjoy herself too.
characters: ['Hoshino, Miyako', 'Hoshino, Hinata', 'Shirosaki, Hana', 'Himesaka, Noa', 'Konomori, Kanon', 'Matsumoto, Yuuna', 'Matsumoto, Kouko', 'Tanemura, Koyori', 'Hoshino, Chizuru']
